template.name: Portal layout : application form menu entries

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 another_name_checkbox d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 another_name_checkbox'][dip and customer_type != 'protection']

div.label: Date of Name Change

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 dual_nationality d-none' if customer_type == 'protection' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 dual_nationality'
div.label: Second / Dual Nationality *
When do you start continue living in UK *
Do you hold Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR)? *

div.div: Please enter a valid Email Address.
Please enter a valid Email Address.
Please enter a valid 11-digit mobile number.

div.div: Please enter a valid 11-digit Telephone number.
Please add your last three years address history

div.label: Current Landlord Name

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 current_landlord_address d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 current_landlord_address'][illustration and customer_type == 'ftb']

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 local_authority_postcode d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 local_authority_postcode'][illustration and customer_type == 'ftb']

Additional costs for financial dependents aged 18 and above *
Please clarify why the child care cost is zero or has a less figure *

div.div: Please enter a valid 11-digit work telephone number.

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 current_contract_start_date d-none' if customer_type == 'protection' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 current_contract_start_date'
div.label: Current Contract Start Date *

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 failed_to_keep_up_repayments d-none' if customer_type == 'protection' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 failed_to_keep_up_repayments'

select.option: Only by client or with someone else

select.option: Both Life and Critical Illness Cover

button.style: color: red; padding: 0px; margin-left: -6px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom:15px;
button.name: delete

div.label: Do you have any existing employer sick pay benefit?
How many months can you claim?
How long have you been registered with a UK GP?

select.name: smoking
select.option: No, I have never smoked or used e-cigarettes
Yes, I do smoking (on special occasions/ regularly)

div.label: How many cigarettes are you using?

div.label: How much are you drinking alcohol?

div.t-att-class: ['card bg-white property_portfolio d-none', 'card bg-white property_portfolio'][customer_type != 'ftb']

div.label: Latest Case No of the Property

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 alteration_passport d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 alteration_passport'][dip and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 1. Alteration page in the passport if available / Change of name deed
2.Scanned copy of the first 2 pages of the duly signed passport in white background without cropping the edges
3.Scanned copy of the two sides of Driving License if passport is expired
4.Scanned copy of both sides of your BRP / Visa Stamp if applicable only with the first two pages of the old passport
5.One of the following documents issued within last 3 months (Electricity Bill / Gas bill / Land phone bill / Credit card bill / Bank statement) / Latest Council tax bill

6.One of the following documents issued within last 3 months received via post since the online documents are not acceptable (Electricity Bill / Gas bill / Land phone bill / Credit card bill / Bank statement)
7. Scanned copy of both sides of the driving license as proof of address
8.Scanned copy of the duly signed, all pages of employment appointment letter evidencing the working hours and remuneration

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 employment_contract d-none' if customer_type == 'protection' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 employment_contract'

label.span: 9. Scanned copy of the duly signed letter of current contract
10.Last 2 years bonus payslips of each employment
11.Latest 3 months payslips of each employment
12.Last P60
13.Latest 3 months bank statements showing salary credit with account name, address and sort code
14.Salary increment letter if any payrise available in the last 3 months
15.Name confirmation letter issued by the employer if the name on the payslip is different from the bank statement
16.Latest 3 months bank statements by showing the pension credit which clearly show the account number, sort code, account holder's name and address
17.Private or Company Pension Forecast / State Pension Statement or Annuity Statement dated within the last 3 months

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 last_2_years_tax_calculations d-none' if customer_type == 'ftb' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 last_2_years_tax_calculations'

label.span: 18.Last two years tax calculations (SA302)

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 last_2_years_tax_year_overview d-none' if customer_type == 'ftb' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 last_2_years_tax_year_overview'

label.span: 19.Last two years tax year Overview

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 last_2_years_tax_returns d-none' if customer_type == 'ftb' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 last_2_years_tax_returns'

label.span: 20.Last 2 years Tax Returns (SA100)

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 signed_finalized_latest_2_years_company_accounts d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 signed_finalized_latest_2_years_company_accounts'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 21.Latest 3 months company bank statements

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 signed_finalized_latest_2_years_company_accounts d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 signed_finalized_latest_2_years_company_accounts'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 22.Signed and finalized Latest 2 years company accounts

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statement_name_confirmation d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statement_name_confirmation'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 23.Latest 3 months bank statements by showing the credit of the other income which clearly show the account number, sort code, account holder's name and address

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 tax_credit_statement d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 tax_credit_statement'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 24.Scanned copy of all pages of the statement issued from the HMRC for tax credits (including the blank pages)

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 universal_tax_credit_statements d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 universal_tax_credit_statements'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 25.Latest 3 months statements of universal tax credit

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 child_tax_credit_award_letter d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 child_tax_credit_award_letter'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 26.Scanned copy of all pages of the Child Tax credit award letter issued by DWP (including blank pages)

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 pip_dla_letter d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 pip_dla_letter'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 27.Scanned copy of all pages of the PIP / DLA letter issued by DWP (including blank pages)

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 latest_multi_agency_credit_report d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 latest_multi_agency_credit_report'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 28.Latest multi agency credit report generated within 2 weeks
29.Latest clearance statement if any commitment has been paid off in last month
30.Latest 3 months bank statements by showing monthly expenses if the statement is different from salary credit which clearly show the account number, sort code, account holder's name and address

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statement_name_confirmation d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statement_name_confirmation'][illustration]

label.span: 31.If the name in the bank statement is different from the passport, name confirmation letter from the bank

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statements_3_months d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statements_3_months'][illustration]

label.span: 32.Latest 3 months bank statements of each account (showing source of deposit with account holder's name, address, sort code)

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 other_expenses_bank_statements d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 other_expenses_bank_statements'][customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 33. Latest bank statement of requested Direct debit account which clearly show the account number, sort code, account holder's name and address

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 bank_statements_3_months' + ('d-none' if customer_type not in ['ftb', 'hm', 'rrm', 'com_btl_purchase'] else '')

label.span: 34.Latest 3 months bank statements of each account (showing source of deposit with account holder's name, address, sort code)

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 gifted_deposit_format' + ('d-none' if customer_type not in ['ftb', 'hm', 'rrm', 'com_btl_purchase'] else '')

label.span: 35.Format of gifted deposit (editable PDF)

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 donor_bank_statements_3_months' + ('d-none' if customer_type not in ['ftb', 'hm', 'rrm', 'com_btl_purchase'] else '')

label.span: 36.Latest 3 months bank statements of donor

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 donor_bank_statements_3_months d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 donor_bank_statements_3_months'][customer_type != 'ftb' and customer_type != 'hm' and customer_type != 'rrm' and customer_type != 'btl_remortgage']

label.span: 37.Latest 3 months bank statements of the SPV

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 reservation_form d-none' if customer_type != 'ftb' and customer_type != 'hm' and customer_type != 'rrm' and customer_type != 'btl_remortgage' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 reservation_form ' + ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 reservation_form d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 reservation_form'][illustration]

label.span: 39.Reservation Form

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 cml_form d-none' if customer_type != 'ftb' and customer_type != 'hm' and customer_type != 'rrm' and customer_type != 'btl_remortgage' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 cml_form ' + ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 cml_form d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 cml_form'][illustration]

label.span: 40.CML form

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 memorandum_of_sale d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 memorandum_of_sale'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 42.Memorandum of Sale

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 epc d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 epc'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 43.EPC

div.t-att-class: 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 peal d-none' if customer_type != 'ftb' and customer_type != 'hm' and customer_type != 'rrm' and customer_type != 'btl_remortgage' else 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 peal ' + ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 peal d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 peal'][illustration]

label.span: 44.PEA

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 mortgage_statement d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 mortgage_statement'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 45.Mortgage statement by showing the monthly payments

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 arla_letter d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 arla_letter'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 46.ARLA letter issued by a ARLA registered estate agent by confirming the expected monthly rental income

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 tenancy_agreement_btl d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 tenancy_agreement_btl'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 47.Tenancy Agreement if BTL remortgage

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 rental_credit_bank_statements_3_months d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 rental_credit_bank_statements_3_months'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 48.Latest 3 months bank statements evidencing the credit of monthly rental

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 btl_mortgage_payment_bank_statements_3_months d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 btl_mortgage_payment_bank_statements_3_months'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 49.Latest 3 months bank statements evidencing the mortgage payment of BTL property

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 mortgage_statement_monthly_payments d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 mortgage_statement_monthly_payments'][customer_type != 'ftb']

label.span: 50.Mortgage statement showing the monthly payments

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 tenancy_agreements_multiple_occupants d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 tenancy_agreements_multiple_occupants'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 51.Tenancy Agreements issued for multiple occupants

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 spv_bank_statements_3_months d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 spv_bank_statements_3_months'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 52.Latest 3 months bank statements of the SPV

div.t-att-class: ['mb-0 py-2 col-12 sales_particulars d-none', 'mb-0 py-2 col-12 sales_particulars'][illustration and customer_type != 'protection']

label.span: 53.Sales Particular
